summary: A collection of ten Redguard style saddles. Imperial saddle retexture. Playable modder's resource. You find ten horses and the saddles near Riften stables. I added the esp only as a sample. It will stay a resource you can use for your own mods.
descriptionHtml:
SE version ported by PhysicsFish:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/19074]Tasheni Saddles Redguard Collection SE
[/url]

Ten Redguard saddles come in three different sizes: Vanillla, Arab and Gypsy. You will find some saddled horses near Riften stables. Saddles work perfect with Vanilla, Swift Steeds, Winterhorses.

Thank you Fierymarigold and AlienSlof for your excellent resources.

If you like it, you are welcome to post screenshots. Have fun.

Look at my other work:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85381/?]Tasheni Followers - All for One and One for All
[/url]ï»¿[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90429/]Winterhorses - Tasheni Mod Project - also available for SE
[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92433?tab=posts]Tasheni Saddles - also available for SE
[/url]
author: Tasheni
